channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-20746|2024-06-18T20:35:18.906Z -- adobe -- premiere%20pro
item.description: Premiere Pro versions 24.1, 23.6.2 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-20745|2024-06-18T20:33:52.847Z -- adobe -- premiere%20pro
item.description: Premiere Pro versions 24.1, 23.6.2 and earlier are affected by a Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-20745|2024-03-18T14:59:22.395Z -- adobe -- premiere%20pro
item.description: Premiere Pro versions 24.1, 23.6.2 and earlier are affected by a Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-20746|2024-03-18T14:59:23.153Z -- adobe -- premiere%20pro
item.description: Premiere Pro versions 24.1, 23.6.2 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
